casebody.data:
Midwestern Indemnity Company, Appellee, v. Savage et al.; Rich, Appellant.

[Cite as Midwestern Indemn. Co. v. Savage, 99 Ohio St.3d 242, 2003-Ohio-3393.]

(Nos. 2002-2058 and 2002-2082 Submitted April 29, 2003 Decided July 16, 2003.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Penn Traffic Co. v. AIU Ins. Co., 99 Ohio St.3d 227, 2003-Ohio-3373, 790 N.E.2d 1199, decided today.

*243Mazanec, Raskin & Ryder Co., L.P.A., Edward M. Ryder, David K. Frank and Kristin L. Gatherum, for appellee. Keating, Muething & Klekamp, P.L.L., William A. Posey and Joseph M. Callow Jr., for appellant. Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton and O’Con-nor, JJ., concur. O’Donnell, J., not participating.
